name: Ozone Layer
description:
THIS IS A EARLY PROTOTYPE!!

in the future there will be a time limit to the layers.

controls:

COMMA = go down a layer IF you have a pickaxe or a staircase

period = go up a layer

slots 1 2 3 = usable inventory slots, this can use a shovel to destroy wall blocks, eat food, or use a sword on a monster

if you get stuck, kill a monster to get a pickaxe.

also, all rights reserved, no copying code or anything!
